meanings.definition: The state of being in hell or condemned to eternal punishment.
meanings.sent1: After his wicked deeds, he feared ending up in perditions.
meanings.sent2: The villain met his end in the perditions of the underworld.
meanings.sent3: The thought of facing perditions for his sins made him shiver.
meanings.sent4: The criminal's actions led him straight into the perditions of damnation.
meanings.sent5: The concept of perditions haunted his nightmares.

meanings.sent2: The cult warned of the perditions awaiting those who strayed from the path.
meanings.sent3: Sneezing during the quiet ceremony caused quite the perditions.
